creditline: Gift of Roberta and Richard Simmons
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: One panel joined with a randa; weft bands of blue and white ikat in several different patterns; alternating with narrow stripes of twill variations in orange, blue, green and red; ikat bands have narrow stripes of solid pink, red or turquoise running through them.
title: Woman's skirt (Corte)
